item.description:
HERE WE GO! The 2010 AFL Grand Final will be played off between St Kilda & Collingwood in what is set to be an absolute cracker and the Boston Demons Aussie Rules Football Club have secured special permission from the City of Boston to show the game LIVE for the first time in over 10 years. Game starts at 12am and we will be open past usual closing time through till 4am. Meat Pies, Aussie beer, raffle with Bruins and Celtics tickets & more. Biggest day in the Aussie sporting calendar and everyone is encouraged to attend! Will be a fantastic night! Guaranteed!

Kings
54 Dalton St
Back Bay MA
10pm to 4am

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: AFL Grand Final Party LIVE!
